title: Wtf Roit please
body:
Couldn't pick a champ or do any bans because for some reason my masteries page glitched out and covered my screen and I couldn't do anything to close it or move it.

http://i.imgur.com/H91PB2C.jpg?1

I blame sephyre this is all his fault.

replies.body: lol happened to me in champ select except it was telling me how lb was free to ply

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=axBFmIFe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-27T11:13:50.347+0000)
>
> Send a support ticket

Is there any point Riot likely won't care or give me back 3lp or w/e, besides support doesn't respond ever (at least not real people).

I've had my support ticket replied to within the matter of 15 minutes.
I suggest you send one.

Your LP is probably gone but you can still send a support ticket notifying them of the problem so it doesn't happen again. The two support tickets I have sent have been replied to by real people so I think it is worth a try.
it happens got stuck in home when my friends were in lobby this was norms so it wasn't that bad but yeah...
